answers.answer: I have been hungry all the time my whole pregnancy and I am 19 weeks... I try not to eat as much anymore tho cause I don't want to gain much more weight
I'm 28 weeks 4 days and I know how u feel I have gestation diabetes and am limited to what I can eat and when but all I wanna do is eat

Yeah I have to be careful about my weight gainning Becuase I've had history of HBP and even tho Ive been having it under control for over a year now I'm still at risk.. ***** not being able to eat everything I Want and not gain weight or be unhealthy..

question: Ugh lately now that I am 28weeks and 5days I feel like I'm always hungry and during the beginning of my pregnancy I never had this problem! The worse part is that I'm not suppose to gain much weight So I'm scare of eating alot or late at night! Has anyone gone through this? Where you are hungry all the time?
title: Hungry all the time!
